title: VOTE: This Live Action Little Mermaid Movie Is Definitely NOT Disney Will You Even Bother??
text:
OK, before you watch this new trailer for The Little Mermaid , we have to manage your expectations right now!
This is NOT the Disney live action version which is in the queue after Dumbo , The Lion King , and probably 20 other remakes .
This is also NOT the Universal film written by Love Actually scribe Richard Curtis — though that film is still in the works, after both Elle Fanning and Chloë Grace Moretz AND director Sofia Coppola dropped out, things don't look great for that one.
Related: Are Chloë & Brooklyn Beckham Back Together?? 
No, this is the off OFF brand version, the money-grab, probably straight-to- RedBox , knockoff — kind of like Snow Queen was to Frozen , only the name The Little Mermaid is public domain.
This film stars relative unknowns Poppy Drayton ( The Shannara Chronicles ) and William Moseley (Prince Liam on The Royals ). Its biggest claim to fame is scoring Oscar winner Shirley MacLaine .
Don't believe us this is a fly-by-night organization? The official trailer isn't even in HD!
Nevertheless, the first look has caught fire, with a million and a half views in its first 24 hours. (So if you were just clicking on it hoping to hear Kiss The Girl , you're in good company.)
Ch-ch-check out the trailer (below) then tell us if YOU'RE going to watch — or wait for the big budget version!

So, Perezcious readers…
